ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
The country converter (coco) is a Python package to convert and match
country names between different classifications and between different
naming versions. Internally it uses regular expressions to match country
names. Coco can also be used to build aggregation concordance matrices
between different classification schemes.
about.summary: The country converter (coco) - a Python package for converting country names between different classifications schemes.

about.description:
The country converter (coco) is a Python package to convert and match
country names between different classifications and between different
naming versions. Internally it uses regular expressions to match country
names. Coco can also be used to build aggregation concordance matrices
between different classification schemes.
about.summary: The country converter (coco) - a Python package for converting country names between different classifications schemes.

name: country_converter
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "country_converter" %}
{% set version = "1.3.2" %}
{% set python_min = "3.9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/country_converter-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 60606938da156b0c611fcb5e33ee60f5a1d582e98a9e7911c7f0084feb7659f6

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - coco = country_converter.country_converter:main
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - python {{ python_min }}
  run:
    - pandas >=1.0.0
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - country_converter
  commands:
    - pip check
    - coco --help
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/IndEcol/country_converter
  summary: The country converter (coco) - a Python package for converting country names between different classifications schemes.
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    The country converter (coco) is a Python package to convert and match 
    country names between different classifications and between different 
    naming versions. Internally it uses regular expressions to match country 
    names. Coco can also be used to build aggregation concordance matrices 
    between different classification schemes.
  doc_url: https://github.com/IndEcol/country_converter
  dev_url: https://github.com/IndEcol/country_converter/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md


extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - konstantinstadler
